summary:
Gemunion - EXTENSIBLE

Modular architecture gives a significant boost in development speed

DIVERSE

Wide choice of tools for any kind of cloud-based applications

SCALABLE

Unlimited vertical and horizontal grows to keep up with increasing project's
load

RELIABLE

Sustainable codebase with good test coverage tempered in production mode

DECENTRALIZE

Convenient foundation to build a bridge to the blockchain world

PROGRESSIVE

Takes advantage of cutting-edge technologies to take a lead in the industry
proposal:
Hello Gemunion Community! 👋

We've been admiring your project's extensible, diverse, and scalable architecture and we must say, it's a gem! 💎 

Just like you, we're also big fans of leveraging cutting-edge technologies to stay ahead in the industry. That's why we've developed a suite of B2B tools that we think could be a great match for your project. 

With our tools, you can create your own DEX, launch a blockchain-based lottery, create a multicurrency crypto wallet, set up ERC20 Staking & Yield Farming, establish governance and proposals for your crypto token, create an EVM compatible blockchain bridge, and even a Launchpad solution for IDO pools and token locking. 

And the best part? They're all customizable to fit your project's unique needs. Plus, some of them are available at $0 - revenue share. 

We're not trying to sell you a lottery ticket here, but rather the tools to create your own. 😉 

If you're interested in taking a closer look, check out our demo at https://t.me/onoutdemos or drop us a line. We'd be happy to chat about how we can help Gemunion continue to shine! 💎🚀

Remember, with us, you're not just playing the game, you're creating it!
